name: Cubsey The Platformer
description:
By @Potato_Boy_34 (Programming, Art, Audio)

Made for Pixel Day 2023

STORY:
You're Cubsey, a guy in the Cube World who likes to do nothing and doesn't want to be involved in things. This moment will change his life forever as Evil Gary kidnaps the princess, and the king chooses Cubsey because he is closer to the king.

CONTROLS:

  • Arrow keys - move
  • Space - confirm, jump
  • Enter - pause

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Collect purple coins to continue
  • Watch out for spikes. If you touch them, you go back to the beginning.

SOUNDTRACK:
Stream and buy here

If you like this game, check out my other game I'm working on called Stonomoria Adventure.
Itch io: https://potato-boy-34.itch.io/stonomoria-adventure-demo
